text:
I remember saying I'd use this time for solo practice...
didn't I?

The caretaker at the dorm
seems to have hurt her back pretty bad.

So, I thought it'd be best for her to rest for a bit,
and I offered to handle the cleaning!

...Alright! Mei, could you lend me that broom?
I'll take care of the rest.

W-Wait, no, no, no!
I said I'd do it!

No, if you don't mind, I'd like to take care of it.
I want Mei to be able to focus on her practice.

...I'm sorry! Producer-san!
I didn't consider my priorities...!

...! No, I'm sorry.
That's not what I meant.

It's one of Mei's really good qualities to reach out
to people in need... So I wanted to help too.

Then... let's finish it together!
And then, I'll go practice right away!
